alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:56AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dyer, northwestern Gibson and southwestern Obion Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 256 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cloverdale, or 7 miles southeast of Reelfoot Lake State Park, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newbern, Dyer, Kenton, Rutherford, Obion, Eaton, Cloverdale, Trimble, Hornbeak, Yorkville, Mason Hall, Glass, Lapata, Central, Locust Grove, Roneys Store, Elbridge, Templeton, Currie and Tyson Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
